 2000-05442000-04-130HEALTH,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1196 - CHLOROTHALONIL) which establish a maximum limit (MRL) of 5 ppm on residues of the fungicide chlorothalonil that can be detected in or on wasabi, a member of the Cruciferae or mustard family.
